column5: We are going to Quebec this June and would like to know what the legal limit of lines in the water fishing or trolling is in Quebec.Its 2 in NY.

The brochure "Sportfishing In Quebec" on page 11 states "When angling, only one line at a time may be used and it must be watched closely and constantly." The main regulations are available online:http://www.fapaq.gouv.qc.ca/en/docum...2002/index.htm
